name: The Common Remedy
description:
Summary: The setting of this story is pretty common… Two worlds collided, one full of creatures known as ‘Demons’ the other full of Humans, and since that day they are at war.

The Demons all united under the Demon Overlord, and the Humans under an alliance of Kings.

The Hero is off to face of the Overlord to end the war but something completely different awaits him...

Note: This is my first time doing a Visual Novel with RenPy, or any kind of game by myself. 

It's a very short Visual Novel Project I did for School. It's a story told via a game, so it's very linear.

The Gallery is unlocked from the beginning as I try to look for a solution for it to bu unlocked after you finish the game once.
